codes.charitableAidApplicationProcessed: Charitable aid application is currently being processed
codes.mustBeAfterStartDatetime: must be later than start date and time.
codes.mustBeBeforeStartDatetime: must be earlier than start date and time.
codes.mustBeMoreThanReceiverCount: must be more than number of receivers.
codes.mustBeMoreThanVolunteerCount: must be more than number of volunteers.
codes.notAllowedToUpdateAfterApplicationDeadli: cannot be updated after the application deadline.
codes.notAllowedToUpdateAfterPublished: cannot be updated after it has been published.
codes.receiverCountExceeded: You've reached maximum number of receivers that can be accepted.
codes.unspecific: An unexpected error has occured. Please try again later.
codes.volunteerApplicationProcessed: Volunteer application is currently being processed.
codes.volunteerCountExceeded: You've reached maximum number of volunteers that can be accepted.
